mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (user_id, user_name, password, email, phone) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT USERS.UID, USERS.user_id, USERS.user_name, USERS.password, USERS.email, USERS.phone, USERS.enabled, USERS.reg_date, USERS.upd_date, USER_ROLES.role_name FROM USERS, USER_ROLES WHERE USERS.UID = USER_ROLES.UID AND user_id = #{userId}
